text:
One of the cavets of Digest authentication was Mozilla and netscape didn't
support it .. when according to this page:

http://www.mozilla.org/status/2001-12-12.html

It seems they do, and have for over a year now.

Might want to edit the documentation a bit.
creator: mikezornek@mikezornek.com
erik@codefaktor.de
text:
Fixed. I added Mozilla 1.0.1 (aka Netscape 7) to the list of browsers which
fully support digest auth. Thanks!
